inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: mid-abdominal pain, radiating to the left flank

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: over the last few weeks leading up to admission, she has been experiencing mid-abdominal pain

inclusion.criterion: EUS with or without Fine Needle Aspiration (FNA) for pancreatic cancer screening
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient underwent a EUS with biopsy

notes: Patient has a history of CAD and recently noted abdominal mass, presenting with fevers/rigors and bandemia. She underwent EUS with biopsy, which was consistent with pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas.
